A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Very disappointed in this movie. It was like they were trying to give a big middle finger to the Skywalker legacy and to George Lucas. Too many questions left unanswered and those that were were let downs. Too many silly scenes and the side mission did nothing to add to the story. Rey gets little to no training but is the most power Jedi ever? I hated what they did to Luke's character. The first time I\, a life-long fan\, ever left a Star Wars movie feeling underwhelmed and not caring what happens next.
